name: SKYRUN (Drowsy Bat)
description:
SKYRUN is a 2D platform shooter with procedually generated elements. 

Take on missions and fight for freedom on the rooftops of gigantic skyscrapers 

in a dystopian cyberpunk setting.

  • Engaging core mission gameplay with procedually generated levels
  • Earn powerful utilities and suit upgrades to tackle harder challenges
  • Versatile customization options for your character
